full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BYANG CHUB LAM GYI RIM PA'I DMAR KHRID THAMS CAD MKHYEN PAR BGROD PA'I BDE LAM ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @036A *, ,CES BYANG CHUB LAM GYI RIM PA'I DMAR KHRID THAMS CAD MKHYEN PAR BGROD PA'I BDE LAM ZHES BYA BA 'DI, CHOS SMRA BA BLO BZANG CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN GYIS BYANG CHOS SHIG LA DGE 'DUN 'DUS PA RGYA MTSO'I TSO GSAL ZIN THUN DU STZAL BA ZIN BRIS SU BTAB PA LAS SLAR RANG GI MIG LAM DU PHAB NAS ZHUS DAG BGYIS PA'O, ,'DIS KYANG BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE MI NUB PA'I RGYAL MTSAN DU GYUR CIG ,(SBYIN BDAG RNAMS DANG DGE SLONG BZOD PA SOGS, ,GNAS SKABS MI 'DOD NYER 'TSE KUN ZHI ZHING, ,TSE RING NAD MED BDE SKYID 'BYOR PA RGYAS, ,BSAM PA'I DON RNAMS CHOS BZHIN 'GRUB PAR SHOG ,DAM CHOS LDAN PA'I MTHO RIS RTEN BZANG THOB, ,MTSAN LDAN DGE BA'I BSHES KYIS RJES SU BZUNG, ,GDAMS DON TSUL BZHIN BSGRUB PAS MAR GYUR GYI, ,'GRO RNAMS DON DU KUN MKHYEN MYUR THOB SHOG , ,,DGE'O,, ,,LEGS S+HO,, ,,MANGGA LAm, ,
author_simple: BLO BZANG CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN,
